alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:16AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Scott County through 645 AM CDT... At 615 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Waldron, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Cardiff... Y City... Needmore... Olio... Cedar Creek... Harvey... Boles... Parks... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County
